QueryDefinition.Query: select distinct a.patid, eventdate, null place_of_service_source_value, right(a.patid,3) as care_site_id, cast((cast(a.patid as bigint)*100000000)+(year(a.eventdate) *10000)+ (month(a.eventdate)*100)+ day(a.eventdate) as bigint) as visit_occurrence_id from consultation a JOIN _chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND a.patid = ch.PERSON_ID
